lines: 1. Asewinjo kuom piny man mabor loka nam,En kar dak maber mar jo mo war;Yesu e moloso udi mag dalano,En piny ma ok wanabed moti.
Wanasiki, wanasiki,Epinyno ma tho ok nobedie;Wanasiki, wanasiki,Epinyno ma tho ok nobedie.
2. E dalano maber ma ok wanalalie,Wanabedi gi mor gi lala;Wanapak Ruoth Yesu e piny Ruoth mochwere,Piny ma ok wanathoe kendo.
3. Ka tichwa orumo kwaseyudo `simbo,Masiche ok nobedie kendo;Yuak gi tem norum chuth, wanawer gi jogo,Mosekwongonwa dhiyo kuno.
